sections.summary: focused and dedicated insurance professional motivated to provide superior customer service and drive sales through cold calling, referrals and strategic outside marketing activities. highlights self-motivated property and casualty products driven exceptional interpersonal skills clear and articulate phone manner excellent communication skills cheerful and energetic strong sales-closer dependable cold calling accomplishments consistently qualify for sales bonuses by exceeding sales targets by items as well as monetary goals.
